product_name: Black Diamond Justice Telemark / Randonee Skis - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Pure powder machines, the Black Diamond Justice skis feature rockered tips, semi-rockered tails and massive waists to keep you afloat for making fresh turns all day long. Formula One Technology(TM) features 3 ribs that run the length of the ski to deliver liveliness and power for hard-charging skiing. Lightweight paulownia wood core is surrounded by Torsion Box construction and carbon-fiber reinforements. Torsion Box wraps fiberglass around the core like a burrito, creating powerful energy pop. Rockered tips, semi-rockered tails and 115mm wide waists (on the 185cm skis) create excellent flotation in deep powder; minimal camber lets you surf the soft stuff with ease. Black Diamond Justice skis have high-speed sintered bases that feature a cross-hatch stone grind for a balance of durability, glide and maintenance. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo. Closeout.
short_description: Pure powder machines, the Black Diamond Justice skis feature rockered tips, semi-rockered tails and massive waists to keep you afloat for making fresh turns all day long.
